mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMUTE WHERE COMMUTE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy/MM/dd') AND EMP_NO = #{eno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUTE VALUES (SEQ_COMMUTE_NO.NEXTVAL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy/MM/dd'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'hh24:mi'), NULL, #{eno})
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUTE SET WORKTIME_END = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'hh24:mi') WHERE EMP_NO = #{eno} AND COMMUTE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy/MM/dd')
mapper.select: SELECT COMMUTE_NO, COMMUTE_DATE, WORKTIME_START, WORKTIME_END, C.EMP_NO, EMP_NAME, JOB_NAME, DEPT_NAME FROM COMMUTE C JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON C.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO JOIN JOB J ON E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE WHERE COMMUTE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy/MM/dd') AND C.EMP_NO = #{eno}

SELECT COMMUTE_NO, COMMUTE_DATE, WORKTIME_START, WORKTIME_END, C.EMP_NO, EMP_NAME, JOB_NAME, DEPT_NAME FROM COMMUTE C JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON C.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO JOIN JOB J ON E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE WHERE COMMUTE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND C.EMP_NO = #{eno}
